p: Our literature search identified 617 human cases of HPAI H5N1; we excluded from analysis six cases with missing data on season, yielding a final sample size of 611 ( Figure 1). Cases occurred in 12 Northern Hemisphere countries and three equatorial countries ( Table 1). Of note, all but two of the cases in equatorial countries were in Indonesia; the remaining two were in Nigeria and Djibouti.
